description: Computes the distance transform of a label on the surface.

label.title: Label File
label.description: Label file to apply distance transform.

mode.title: Mode
mode.description: Mode of the distance transform, can be 'signed', 'unsigned', or 'outside'.

output_file.title: Output File
output_file.description: Output file for the distance transform results.

anterior.title: Anterior Distance
anterior.description: Only use anteriormost <dist> portion of the label.

posterior.title: Posterior Distance
posterior.description: Only use posteriormost <dist> portion of the label.

divide.title: Divide Units
divide.description: Divide label into <n> units along primary eigendirection.
